title: English in Business Informatics
ziele:
• Students will learn the skills required to write an academic paper on a topic to be determined in a parallel seminar.
  • Students will identify and acquire presentation techniques which will help them when presenting the findings of their seminar paper to the class.
  • Students will gain an insight into subject-specific terminology.
  • Students will be confronted with up-to-date articles relevant to their studies.
lehrinhalte:
• Characteristics of academic writing
  • Features of punctuation in English
  • Paragraphing and topic sentences
  • Grammar topics
  • Coherence when writing
  • Linking words
  • Presentation techniques
  • Using source materials
  • Comparing and contrasting data
beurteilung:
• Seminar paper written in English
  • Presentation in English based on the findings of the seminar paper
  • Regular performance and active participation
  • Regular attendance
sonstiges: This course is designed for students attending a parallel seminar from the current list (see KUSSS for more details).
voraussetzungen: (*)KS Kommunikative Fertigkeiten Englisch (B2)
methoden:
• Content presentation by instructor
  • Grammar exercises as reinforcement
  • Academic writing practice
  • Whole class discussions on relevant Information Technology topics
  • Pair and group speaking activities
